item.title: Getting Started with Power Fx
item.description: Getting started with Power Fx # The following allows you to start using Power Fx within in the context of a terminal window, much like PowerShell. The guide talks through installing the CLI, adding an authorisation profile and finally connecting to the environment in which to run the Power Fx.
